title: Amazing 1 Bed in Fulton Market/West Loop!
map_address: North Des Plaines St near Fulton
posting_body: Come see this amazing 1 bed located in the best part of the city.

Priced to rent quickly--if you are interested please call to set up a showing ASAP!Located at the edge of West Loop and River North, these impeccably designed residences are complemented by impressive views of the city skyline, as well as today's most in-demand features and amenities.
Right next to a grocery store across the street super convenient!
Entering the building’s stunning lobby, residents are welcomed home by a dedicated 24-hour concierge.
The collection of convenience-focused amenities includes an outdoor pool, sundeck with grilling stations, fitness center, resident lounge, and business center.
Beautifully appointed residences feature modern kitchens with stainless steel appliances and granite countertops, in-unit washer and dryer, spacious bathrooms, and an abundance of natural light.
These impressive details, paired with an uncompromising commitment to service, makes this one of the most sought after apartments in the city!
